div.p: City Hall is located at 245 East Bonita Avenue, San Dimas CA 91773

Hours: Monday through Thursday 7:30 a.m. to 5:30 p.m.
Friday from 8:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m.
Email the City of San Dimas: administration@ci.san-dimas.ca.us
